meanings.definition: The quality or state of being definite.
meanings.sent1: The definitenesses of his answer left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent2: The definitenesses of the instructions made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: Her definitenesses in choosing a movie always leads to a fun time.
meanings.sent4: The definitenesses of the rules were like a guiding light in the chaos.
meanings.sent5: The definitenesses of the deadline helped everyone stay on track.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being clear or certain.
meanings.sent1: The definitenesses of the map made navigation simple.
meanings.sent2: The definitenesses of her decision put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent3: His definitenesses in choosing a restaurant always pays off.
meanings.sent4: The definitenesses of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The definitenesses of the answer finally brought peace of mind.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being precise or exact.
meanings.sent1: The definitenesses of the measurements were crucial for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The definitenesses of his calculations impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: Her definitenesses in following the recipe always leads to a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The definitenesses of his aim never failed to hit the target.
meanings.sent5: The definitenesses of the plan ensured its success.
